metadata.title: Lysol Professional Disinfectant Heavy Duty Bathroom Cleaner Concentrate, 128 Ounce (Pack of 4)
features: Lysol, gallon professional concentrated heavy duty bathroom cleaner, citrus lime scent, dilatable up to 4 oz/gallon of water
Adds Extra shine to your product
description: This hospital disinfectant cleaner can be used for all your restroom cleaning needs. It is effective against MRSA and has the ability to penetrate tough soils, including soap scum. It is non-acid and non-abrasive and has a fresh lime scent to deodorize. It is an economical, concentrated formula that makes up to 32 gallons for general cleaning and disinfection (broad-spectrum disinfectant at 1:32, 1:8 for hospital use). Use on bathtubs, shower stalls, glazed ceramic tile, floors, sinks, garbage cans, toilet bowls, glazed porcelain, chrome and acrylic plastic fixtures.

Specifically designed for restrooms, Professional LYSOL Brand Disinfectant Heavy Duty Bathroom Cleaner Concentrate is a virucidal, fungicidal, and bactericidal cleaner that meets EPA standards for disinfecting hard, nonporous surfaces and leaves a fresh lime scent. Its non-abrasive formula is safe and effective on bathtubs, shower stalls, glazed ceramic tile, floors, sinks, and more. It is ideal for hotels, motels, hospitals, nursing homes, health clubs, day care centers, dental offices and other health care facilities.
Deep cleaning bathroom cleaner kills bacteria, viruses, and fungi.

Professional LYSOL Brand Disinfectant Heavy Duty Bathroom Cleaner is a concentrated bathroom cleaner designed to disinfect hard, nonporous surfaces. Its acid-free, non-abrasive formula is safe to use across a range of restroom surfaces including shower stalls, floors, countertops, toilets, tile backsplashes, garbage bins, and more. It penetrates tough soils, including soap scum.
Kills Viruses, Bacteria, and Fungi on Contact

This powerful formula kills harmful bacteria, including Enterococcus faecalis, Escherichia coli, Klebsiella pneumoniae, MRSA, and multiple types of Proteus, Salmonella, Staphlyococcus, and Streptococcus. It also eliminates herpes simplex virus type 1 and 2, HIV-1 (AIDS virus), influenza type A, respiratory syncytial virus, and rotavirus WA as well as fungi that cause athlete's foot, mold, and mildew.
As it cleans, Professional LYSOL Brand Disinfectant Heavy Duty Bathroom Cleaner Concentrate deodorizes, leaving behind a fresh lime scent.

Professional LYSOL Brand Disinfectant Heavy Duty Bathroom Cleaner is highly concentrated, which makes it an economical choice--1 gallon makes up to 32 gallons of general-use cleaning solution or 8 gallons of heavy-duty sanitizing solution.
Lysol for Office, Professional, and Industrial Facilities

Because germs, dirt, and odors never take a break, rely on Professional Lysol for disinfection, cleaning, and odor control products. From break rooms and kitchens to restrooms and laboratories, Lysol has you covered.
Professional LYSOL Brand Disinfectant Heavy Duty Bathroom Cleaner Concentrate, 1-gallon bottle (Pack of 4).
Disinfectant Heavy Duty Bathroom Cleaner Concentrate
